TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XslCompiledTransform extends System.Object

summary.span: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.

span.span: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法的 XSLT 处理器。The class is an XSLT processor that supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. 它是新实现，并包含性能提升与过时相比类。It is a new implementation and includes performance gains when compared to the obsolete class. 结构类是非常类似于类。The structure of the class is very similar to the class. 方法加载和编译样式表，而方法执行 XSLT 转换。The method loads and compiles the style sheet, while the method executes the XSLT transform. XSLT 支持`document()`函数以及嵌入式的脚本块默认处于禁用状态。Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks are disabled by default. 可以通过创建启用这些功能对象并将其传递给方法。These features can be enabled by creating an object and passing it to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[迁移从 XslTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 在创建使用 类的应用程序时，应了解下列项及其含义：When creating an application that uses the class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - 默认情况下禁用 XSLT 脚本。XSLT scripting is disabled by default. 只有要求脚本支持并且处于完全可信的环境下时，才应启用 XSLT 脚本。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment. - 默认情况下禁用 XSLT `document()` 函数。The XSLT `document()` function is disabled by default. 如果启用 `document()` 函数，通过将 对象传递给 方法，限制可以访问的资源。If you enable the `document()` function, restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method. - 默认情况下启用扩展对象。Extension objects are enabled by default. 如果包含扩展对象的 对象传递给 方法，将利用这些扩展对象。If an object containing extension objects is passed to the method, they are utilized. - XSLT 样式表可以包括对其他文件的引用以及嵌入式脚本块。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 恶意用户可能会利用这一点，方法是为您提供数据或样式表，在执行时，可能会使您的系统不断进行处理，直到计算机资源不足。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. - 在混合信任环境下运行的 XSLT 应用程序可能会引发样式表欺骗。XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing. 例如，恶意用户可能会为对象加载有害的样式表，并将其交给另一个用户，而后者会继续调用 方法并执行转换。For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the method and executes the transformation. 如果不启用脚本或 `document()` 函数（除非样式表来自可信的源），或不接受来自不可信的源的 对象、XSLT 样式表或 XML 源数据，可以缓解这些安全问题。These security issues can be mitigated by not enabling scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source, and by not accepting objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from an untrusted source. ## Examples 下面的示例执行转换，然后将输出到文件。The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file. [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/CS/Xslt_Transform_v2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/VB/Xslt_Transform_v2.vb#1)] 此示例使用以下两个输入的文件：The sample uses the following two input files: `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以单步执行代码，调试样式表，必须满足以下条件：The following conditions must be met in order to step into the code and debug the style sheet: - `enableDebug` 参数设置为 `true`。The `enableDebug` parameter is set to `true`. - 样式表传递给方法作为一个 URI 或实现类，该类实现接口。The style sheet is passed to the method either as a URI, or an implementation of the class that implements the interface. 接口实现上所有的文本分析对象。The interface is implemented on all text-parsing objects. 换而言之，如果使用加载样式表对象，如或，或不实现的实现接口，你无法调试样式表。In other words, if the style sheet is loaded using an object, such as an or , or an implementation that does not implement the interface, you cannot debug the style sheet. - 用于加载样式表是基于文件的，如(这是默认由类)。The used to load the style sheet is a file-based , such as the (this is the default used by the class). - 样式表是位于本地计算机上，也可以在 intranet 上。The style sheet is located on the local machine or on the intranet. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用 XSLT 调试。The following example shows how to enable XSLT debugging. remarks.format: ## Remarks `xsltc.exe`工具是周围的包装器方法。The `xsltc.exe` tool is a wrapper around the method. 编译样式表与`xsltc.exe`将满足大部分利用已编译的样式表使用的应用程序的要求。Compiling style sheets with the `xsltc.exe` will meet the demands of most applications that leverage the use of compiled style sheets. 方法应构建自定义编译工具时使用。The method should be used when building custom compilation tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 类的总体性能优于 类，但在首次对转换调用时， 类的 方法可能比 类的 方法慢。Although the overall performance of the class is better than the class, the method of the class might perform more slowly than the method of the class the first time it is called on a transformation. 这是因为必须先编译 XSLT 文件，才能加载该文件。This is because the XSLT file must be compiled before it is loaded. 有关详细信息，请参阅以下博客文章：[XslCompiledTransform 比 XslTransform 慢？](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590)For more information, see the following blog post: [XslCompiledTransform Slower than XslTransform?](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590) > [!NOTE] > 以调试模式编译的 XSLT 与以发布模式编译的 XSLT 之间有一些差别。There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode. 在有些情况下，以调试模式编译的样式表在 期间不会引发错误，但以后在 期间会失败。In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during , but will later fail during . 以发布模式编译的同一个样式表在 期间就会失败。The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during . 例如，当某个表达式需要节点集，而分配给该表达式的变量不是节点集类型的时，就会出现这种情况。An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。The class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace. 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 无用户凭据用于解析样式表的 URI，并处理所有`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`元素。An with no user credentials is used to resolve the style sheet URI, and process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements. - 使用默认设置用于加载样式表。An with default settings is used to load the style sheet. 在上禁用 DTD 处理。DTD processing is disabled on the . 如果需要 DTD 处理，则创建启用了此功能后，并将其传递到方法。If you require DTD processing, create an with this feature enabled, and pass it to the method. - `document()`函数处于禁用状态。The `document()` function is disabled. - 不支持嵌入的脚本。Embedded scripts are not supported. 你可以使用重载来指定使用必要的身份验证的凭据，或指定不同的 XSLT 设置。You can use the overload to specify an with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings. ## Examples 下面的示例执行转换，然后将输出到文件。The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsltc.exe 工具用于编译样式表并从样式表生成程序集。The xsltc.exe tool is used to compile style sheets and generate assemblies from the style sheets. 方法加载程序集中的已编译的样式表。The method loads the compiled style sheet from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 您还必须在你的应用程序中包含作为引用的 XSLT 程序集。You must also include the XSLT assembly as a reference in your application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 XSLT 程序集加载已编译的样式表。The following example shows how to load a compiled style sheet from an XSLT assembly. 该示例假定 xsltc.exe 工具已用于创建一个名为 bookOrders 类的名为 bookOrders.dll 程序集。The example assumes that the xsltc.exe tool was used to create an assembly named bookOrders.dll with a class named bookOrders. > [!NOTE] > 你必须在编译代码时引用 XSLT 程序集。You have to reference the XSLT assembly when compiling the code. 例如 `csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`。For example, `csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`. ``` // Load the type of the class. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(typeof(bookOrders)); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。The class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace. 从当前节点的加载样式表通过其所有子级。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这使您要用作样式表文档的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 后方法完成时，样式表末尾后定位到下一个节点。After the method completes, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 无用户凭据用于处理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`元素。An with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements. - `document()`函数处于禁用状态。The `document()` function is disabled. - 不支持嵌入的脚本。Embedded scripts are not supported. 你可以使用重载来指定使用必要的身份验证的凭据，或指定不同的 XSLT 设置。You can use the overload to specify an with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings. ## Examples 下面的示例加载样式表中包含对象。The following example loads a style sheet contained in an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 以调试模式编译的 XSLT 与以发布模式编译的 XSLT 之间有一些差别。There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode. 在有些情况下，以调试模式编译的样式表在 期间不会引发错误，但以后在 期间会失败。In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during , but will later fail during . 以发布模式编译的同一个样式表在 期间就会失败。The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during . 例如，当某个表达式需要节点集，而分配给该表达式的变量不是节点集类型的时，就会出现这种情况。An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XSLT`document()`启用功能，则会得到解决使用使用没有用户凭据。If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则请使用采用的重载作为其自变量之一并指定使用必要的凭据。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 此方法不支持`xsl:strip-space`元素。This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element. 如果你已编译的样式表包含`xsl:strip-space`元素，则必须使用重载此方法采用作为输入参数。If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the overload which takes an as the input argument. 接口在 和 类中实现。The interface is implemented in the and classes. 这两个类表示 XML 数据的内存中缓存。These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data. - 类基于 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 并具有编辑功能。The class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities. - 类是基于 XPath 数据模型的只读数据存储。The class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model. 是 XSLT 处理建议使用的类。 is the recommended class for XSLT processing. 与 类相比，此类的性能更强。It provides faster performance when compared to the class. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果您传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段，必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的对象，并将该对象传递给 方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：转换节点片断](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md). ## Examples 下面的示例执行 XSLT 转换，并输出到对象。The following example executes an XSLT transformation and outputs to an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XSLT`document()`启用功能，则会得到解决使用使用没有用户凭据。If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则请使用采用的重载作为其自变量之一并指定使用必要的凭据。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 此方法不支持`xsl:strip-space`元素。This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element. 如果你已编译的样式表包含`xsl:strip-space`元素，则必须使用重载此方法采用作为输入参数。If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the overload which takes an as the input argument. 接口在 和 类中实现。The interface is implemented in the and classes. 这两个类表示 XML 数据的内存中缓存。These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data. - 类基于 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 并具有编辑功能。The class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities. - 类是基于 XPath 数据模型的只读数据存储。The class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model. 是 XSLT 处理建议使用的类。 is the recommended class for XSLT processing. 与 类相比，此类的性能更强。It provides faster performance when compared to the class. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果您传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段，必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的对象，并将该对象传递给 方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：转换节点片断](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md).
